templates.name: default

templates.name: lora
templates.title: LoRA
templates.description: 특정 스타일이나 주제를 위한 LoRA 모델로 이미지를 생성합니다.

templates.name: lora_multiple
templates.title: 다중 LoRA

templates.name: inpaint_example

templates.description: 이미지의 특정 부분을 자연스럽게 편집합니다.

templates.name: inpaint_model_outpainting
templates.title: 아웃페인팅
templates.description: 이미지를 원래 경계 너머로 확장합니다.

templates.name: embedding_example
templates.title: 임베딩
templates.description: 일관된 스타일을 위해 텍스트 인버전을 사용하여 이미지를 생성합니다.

templates.name: gligen_textbox_example
templates.title: 글리젠 텍스트박스
templates.description: 텍스트 박스를 사용해 객체의 위치를 정밀하게 지정하여 이미지를 생성합니다.

templates.name: video_wan2_2_14B_t2v
templates.title: Wan 2.2 14B Text to Video
templates.description: Generate high-quality videos from text prompts with cinematic aesthetic control and dynamic motion generation using Wan 2.2.

templates.name: video_wan2_2_14B_i2v
templates.title: Wan 2.2 14B Image to Video
templates.description: Transform static images into dynamic videos with precise motion control and style preservation using Wan 2.2.

templates.name: video_wan2_2_14B_flf2v
templates.title: Wan 2.2 14B First-Last Frame to Video
templates.description: Generate smooth video transitions by defining start and end frames.

templates.name: video_wan2_2_14B_fun_inpaint
templates.title: Wan 2.2 14B Fun Inp
templates.description: Generate videos from start and end frames using Wan 2.2 Fun Inp.

templates.name: video_wan2_2_14B_fun_control
templates.title: Wan 2.2 14B Fun Control
templates.description: Generate videos guided by pose, depth, and edge controls using Wan 2.2 Fun Control.

templates.name: video_wan2_2_5B_ti2v
templates.title: Wan 2.2 5B Video Generation
templates.description: Generate videos from text or images using Wan 2.2 5B hybrid model

templates.name: video_wan_vace_14B_t2v
templates.title: Wan VACE 텍스트 → 비디오
templates.description: VACE-14B 모델로 480p 및 720p 고품질 비디오를 생성합니다.

templates.name: video_wan_vace_14B_v2v

templates.name: video_wan_vace_inpainting

templates.name: image_omnigen2_image_edit
templates.title: OmniGen2 Image Edit
templates.description: Edit images with natural language instructions using OmniGen2's advanced image editing capabilities and text rendering support.

templates.name: image_cosmos_predict2_2B_t2i
templates.title: Cosmos Predict2 2B T2I
templates.description: Generate images with Cosmos-Predict2 2B T2I, delivering physically accurate, high-fidelity, and detail-rich image generation.

templates.name: hidream_i1_dev
templates.title: HiDream I1 Dev
templates.description: Generate images with HiDream I1 Dev - Balanced version with 28 inference steps, suitable for medium-range hardware.

templates.name: hidream_i1_fast
templates.title: HiDream I1 Fast
templates.description: Generate images quickly with HiDream I1 Fast - Lightweight version with 16 inference steps, ideal for rapid previews on lower-end hardware.

templates.name: hidream_i1_full
templates.title: HiDream I1 Full
templates.description: Generate images with HiDream I1 Full - Complete version with 50 inference steps for highest quality output.

templates.name: hidream_e1_1
templates.title: HiDream E1.1 Image Edit
templates.description: Edit images with HiDream E1.1 – it’s better in image quality and editing accuracy than HiDream-E1-Full.

templates.name: hidream_e1_full
templates.title: HiDream E1 Image Edit
templates.description: Edit images with HiDream E1 - Professional natural language image editing model.

templates.name: sd3.5_simple_example
templates.title: SD3.5 Simple
templates.description: Generate images using SD 3.5.

templates.name: sd3.5_large_canny_controlnet_example
templates.title: SD3.5 Large Canny ControlNet
templates.description: Generate images guided by edge detection using SD 3.5 Canny ControlNet.

templates.name: sd3.5_large_depth
templates.title: SD3.5 Large Depth
templates.description: Generate images guided by depth information using SD 3.5.

templates.name: sd3.5_large_blur
templates.title: SD3.5 Large Blur
templates.description: Generate images guided by blurred reference images using SD 3.5.

templates.name: sdxl_simple_example
templates.title: SDXL Simple
templates.description: Generate high-quality images using SDXL.

templates.name: sdxl_refiner_prompt_example
templates.title: SDXL Refiner Prompt
templates.description: Enhance SDXL images using refiner models.

templates.name: sdxl_revision_text_prompts
templates.title: SDXL Revision Text Prompts
templates.description: Generate images by transferring concepts from reference images using SDXL Revision.

templates.name: sdxl_revision_zero_positive
templates.title: SDXL Revision Zero Positive
templates.description: Generate images using both text prompts and reference images with SDXL Revision.

templates.name: sdxlturbo_example
templates.title: SDXL Turbo
templates.description: Generate images in a single step using SDXL Turbo.

templates.name: image_lotus_depth_v1_1
templates.title: Lotus Depth
templates.description: Run Lotus Depth in ComfyUI for zero-shot, efficient monocular depth estimation with high detail retention.

templates.name: image_chroma_text_to_image
templates.title: Chroma text to image
templates.description: Chroma is modified from flux and has some changes in the architecture.

templates.name: flux_kontext_dev_basic
templates.title: Flux Kontext Dev(Basic)
templates.description: Edit image using Flux Kontext with full node visibility, perfect for learning the workflow.

templates.name: flux_kontext_dev_grouped
templates.title: Flux Kontext Dev(Grouped)
templates.description: Streamlined version of Flux Kontext with grouped nodes for cleaner workspace.

templates.name: flux_dev_checkpoint_example
templates.title: Flux Dev fp8
templates.description: Generate images using Flux Dev fp8 quantized version. Suitable for devices with limited VRAM, requires only one model file, but image quality is slightly lower than the full version.

templates.name: flux_schnell
templates.title: Flux Schnell fp8
templates.description: Quickly generate images with Flux Schnell fp8 quantized version. Ideal for low-end hardware, requires only 4 steps to generate images.

templates.name: flux1_krea_dev
templates.title: Flux.1 Krea Dev
templates.description: A fine-tuned FLUX model pushing photorealism to the max

templates.name: flux_dev_full_text_to_image
templates.title: Flux Dev full text to image
templates.description: Generate high-quality images with Flux Dev full version. Requires larger VRAM and multiple model files, but provides the best prompt following capability and image quality.

templates.name: flux_schnell_full_text_to_image
templates.title: Flux Schnell full text to image
templates.description: Generate images quickly with Flux Schnell full version. Uses Apache2.0 license, requires only 4 steps to generate images while maintaining good image quality.

templates.name: flux_fill_inpaint_example
templates.title: Flux Inpaint
templates.description: Fill missing parts of images using Flux inpainting.

templates.name: flux_fill_outpaint_example
templates.title: Flux Outpaint
templates.description: Extend images beyond boundaries using Flux outpainting.

templates.name: flux_canny_model_example
templates.title: Flux Canny Model
templates.description: Generate images guided by edge detection using Flux Canny.

templates.name: flux_depth_lora_example
templates.title: Flux Depth Lora
templates.description: Generate images guided by depth information using Flux LoRA.

templates.name: flux_redux_model_example
templates.title: Flux Redux Model
templates.description: Generate images by transferring style from reference images using Flux Redux.

templates.title: Upscale

templates.description: Upscale images using ESRGAN models during intermediate generation steps.

templates.name: latent_upscale_different_prompt_model
templates.title: Latent Upscale Different Prompt Model
templates.description: Upscale images while changing prompts across generation passes.
